page.title: 14CAMBRIDGE FAIRS
page.content: THERE ARE VARIOUS FAIRS THAT COME TO CAMBRIDGE. MY FAVOURITE IS THE MIDSUMMER FAIR. IT COMES TO CAMBRIDGE IN LATE JUNE AND IT HAS MANY EXCITING RIDES. MY FAVOURITE RIDE IS THE BIG WHEEL. THE STRAWBERRY FAIR IS A FAIR WHERE PEOPLE CAN COME WITH THEIR OWN PRODUCTS AND SELL THEM. THERE IS A LOT OF GOOD FUN THERE. AT NIGHT THERE IS A ROCK CONCERT WHICH IS USUALLY VERY GOOD. GOING OFF THE SUBJECT OF FAIRS, I WANT TO WRITE ABOUT THE FIREWORK DISPLAY. ON GUY FAWKES DAY THE COUNCIL HOLD A MASSIVE FIREWORK DISPLAY. I THINK IT'S MUCH BETTER THAN HAVING ONE AT A HOUSE. AFTER THE FIREWORK DISPLAY THEY HAVE A BIG BONFIRE WITH A GUY ON TOP. I THINK THAT CAMBRIDGE IS THE BEST TOWN FOR ACTIVITIES.
